protocol_runner module¶

class protocol_runner.ProtocolRunner(head, publisher)[source]¶

Bases: object

Run and manage the running protocol job

Note:The only thing this object currently does is hold the InstructionQueue (instruction_queue) object, but

it will do more in the future
